agreement_COD_STATE: select codeval2 codeval, codeval2 codetxt from ucod2_country_state where codeval1='USA' and (codetdt is null or (codetdt is not null and codetdt > current_date)) order by codseq,codeval2
agreement_COD_MONTH: select mth as codeval,mth as codetxt from V_MONTHS order by N
agreement_COD_YEAR: select yr as codeval,yr as codetxt from V_YEARS order by YR
agreement_sign: update C set C_ATstmp=current_date where C_ID=@C_ID;
with xrslt as (insert into RQST(RQST_SOURCE, RQST_ATYPE, RQST_ANAME, RQST_PARMS) values('CLIENT', 'REPORT', 'AGREEMENT',@RQST_PARMS) returning RQST_ID)
insert into RQST_D(RQST_ID, D_SCOPE, D_SCOPE_ID, D_CTGR, D_Desc) select RQST_ID, 'C',@C_ID, 'AGREEMNT', 'Customer Portal Agreement' from xrslt;
agreement_paymentresult: select PACC_STS "PACC_STS",PACC_PP_Result "PACC_PP_Result",C_PRE.C_ID "C_ID",C_PRE.PE_ID "PE_ID",NEW_CLIENT_Result "NEW_CLIENT_Result",PE_LL_Tstmp "PE_LL_Tstmp" from C_PRE left outer join CPE on C_PRE.PE_ID=CPE.PE_ID where C_PRE_ID=@payment_id and PACC_fp_hash=@fp_hash;
agreement_COD_C_ID: select C_ID as codeval,C_Name as codetxt from C where 1=1 %%%DATALOCKS%%% order by C_Name
agreement_report_N: select N.C_ID "C_ID",N_TYPE "N_TYPE",N_EU,to_char(N_ETstmp,'MM/DD/YYYY') as N_ETstmp,N_Note from N inner join C on C.C_ID=N.C_ID where N.C_ID=@C_ID %%%DATALOCKS%%%
